about_the_game:
Sus Virus Amogus is an action-packed roguelike game set in a captivating sci-fi universe. Players take on the role of a scientist lost in the vastness of space, who finds themselves on an infinite space station teeming with hostile soldiers and advanced robots. The mission is to survive and explore, using an array of randomly generated weapons, each with unique effects that can turn the tide of battle. As players delve deeper into the station, they can upgrade their abilities, unlocking new levels of power and new areas filled with even greater challenges. The blend of strategic gameplay and fast-paced action ensures a thrilling experience every time.



Key Features:

  • Randomized Weapons:

     Discover and utilize a wide variety of weapons, each with its own unique effects, ensuring a fresh experience in every playthrough.

  • Sci-Fi Setting:

    Explore an immersive sci-fi world with detailed environments and a compelling narrative.

  • Progression System:

     Upgrade your character's abilities and unlock new powers to tackle increasingly difficult enemies and obstacles.

  • Challenging Enemies:

     Face off against a diverse array of hostile soldiers and robots, each with distinct behaviors and attack patterns.

  • Infinite Exploration:

     Navigate through an endless space station, with each level presenting new challenges and opportunities for discovery.
